content.rendered:
Source: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/trash.1813/

We use this plugin to allow players to quickly and easily dispose of there unwanted items.

How To Use The Plugin :

  • You Must Turn Your Server Off
  • When You Turn It off Copy The (Trash.jar) To Your Plugins Folder
  • Then Start The Server

How Use Plugin ~

  • You Can Use /Trash [ Must Have Permission {Trash.use}]

Going To Do :

  • Nothing
  • Any Idea ?

Important Things To Know :
– You do not have permission to assign the copyright to you.
– You do not have permission to sell
